title: sari evarammA
sahitya:
sari evarammA amba nI daya jUDavammA shrI kAmAkSi nI


anupallavi

  parama pAvanI bhavAnI dEvI parAshakti nIvani namminAnu
				(svara)
sA* ni ga* ri* sa* ni dha pA ma ni dha pa ma ga pa ma ga ri sA *ni sa ga ga ri ga ma pa dha ni
sA* ri* ga* ri* ga* sa* ri* pA dha ni sa* ri* gA* ri* sa* nI* dha pa gA ri sa ri ga ma pa dha ni


caraNam 1    mAdhava sOdari gaurI mahA bhairavi shAmbhavi nAdarUpiNi janani dEvI nArAyaNI naLinAkSi
    caraNam 2    rAjarjEshvari cidrUpI rAjIvAkSI lOkasAkSi tEjOnmayI jananI dEvI OjOvatI OmkArI
    caraNam 3    pAmara pAvani pArvatI pAkAri vinutE shrI lalitE shyAmakrSNa paripAlini dEvI shyAmagiri suputrI
				(svarasAhitya)
sArasadaLa nayanA harihara suranu talli tA ninu satatamu caraNamu 
kOritini kamalapAda yugamu nammiti sundari shankari I jagamulO
